# pharmaversedata

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of pharmaversedata is to make it easy to access pharmaverse data and its documentation.

## Installation

You can install the development version of pharmaversedata from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("maurolepore/pharmaversedata")
```

## Example

```{r example}
library(tibble)
library(pharmaversedata)

specs$define

specs$datasets

specs$variables

knitr::kable(head(pharmadverse))
```
